channel.title: 667, 718, 728 (need help with unban!)
channel.description:
I need a working unban command! I have tried every unban command but none of them are working. The first one that came with the source said cannot unban through console at this moment, everytime.
And the second one just nothing happened.
Someone please give me a working unban command for 667?

item.title: 667, 718, 728 (need help with unban!)
item.dc:creator: @ic3cr34m ic3cr34m
item.description:
@ic3cr34m wrote:

[quote=“kingcobra805, post:2, topic:465993”]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("unban")) { String name = ""; for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++) name = (new StringBuilder(String.valueOf(name))) .append(cmd[i]) .append(i == cmd.length - 1 ? "" : " ").toString(); World.getWorld().getPunishHandler().unBan(name, false); player.sendMessage("<col=FF0000>You have successfully unbanned " + name + "."); return true; }

should work fine.[/quote]

It came up with errors that had something to do with the world file or idk.
I pasted it clearly into commands.java and it said something about unknown symbol

Read full topic
